text: The men's 400 metres event at the 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Kingston, Jamaica, at National Stadium on 16, 17 and 18 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Darold Williamson ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Jonathan Fortenberry ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Jermaine Gonzales ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 18 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
